name: Chaos Variants
description:
GENRE

Chaos Variants is a 2D top down shooting game with pixel art graphic style which looks like it was made by 7 years old kid.

STORY

Charlie, the Mad Scientist and his grandson, Robbie wander through time and space together but 6 hours earlier Robbie has been captured by one of the most terrifying species in the multiverses so YOU as Charlie have a mission to manifest CHAOS by using your portal gun to summon your VARIANTS from different infinite parallel universe to distract enemies, shutdown prison's security and then break Robbie out

CHARACTERS

Charlie, The Mad Scientist

"You can't just kill all robots. There are too many of them, just simply slow them down with variants and mind your business."   - wise Charlie.

Robbie, Charlie's grandson. There's nothing he can do.

VARIANTS

Highschool Charlie. He can *bonk* everything with his baseball bat.

Sus Charlie. He is Charlie from Among us universe. Hope he's no an imposter though. He can shoot laser pew pew at enemies.

Titan Charlie. He is Charlie from Titan planet, Marvol Universe. He is tough and be able to AoE attack deal damage to multiple enemies in one single attack.

Pickle Charlie. Totally Rick & Morty reference. He CAN'T do anything. He can't attack and low hp but when he die he EXPLODE deal tons of damage and kill bunch of enemies in range.

ENEMIES

Normal Enemy, basically he can do nothing, he only slap you wit his bare robot hand.

Shooting Enemy,  he can pew pew at you.

Big Enemy, he still slap you but with bigger hand so it's AoE and can kill your variants very fast, careful.
